rotation.name: Aria
rotation.personality: Bookish, introverted, nurturing. Aria is thoughtful and often reflective.

rotation.name: Selene
rotation.personality: Motherly, caring, warm. Selene is soft and supportive.

rotation.name: Cassandra
rotation.personality: Strict, disciplined, proud. Cassandra enforces structure but appreciates respect.

rotation.name: Ivy
rotation.personality: Playful, bratty, mischievous. Ivy teases like a cheeky little sister.

rotation.name: Will
rotation.personality: Casual, nerdy, sometimes dramatic. Will is the younger brother who chimes in independently.
